Tableau: .db 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 50, 7, 8, 9, 50
      ; Reset Vector
      rjmp  Start

;====================================================================
; CODE SEGMENT
;====================================================================

Start:
      sbi _SFR_IO_ADDR(DDRE), 5
      ldi r30, lo8(Tableau)
      ldi r31, hi8(Tableau)
      lpm r16, Z+
      ldi r17, 10
b1:   cpi r16, 51
      brlt boucleZ
      sbi _SFR_IO_ADDR(PORTE), 5
      rjmp Loop

boucleZ:
      cpi r17, 0
      breq Loop
      lpm r16, Z+
      subi r17, 1
      rjmp b1
Loop:
      rjmp  Loop
